info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 8 at 7:52PM CDT until April 12 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson MS
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi...
Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi...
Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County.
Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Pearl River at Edinburg.
* WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Saturday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Minor over bank flooding continues in areas south of the river.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 21.5 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.water.noaa.gov/wfo/jan
The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 800 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON
